name: Civilian
tagline: Where there's a WE there's a way.
description: Civilian is a marketing agency designed to strengthen communities. Founded in 1999, Civilian solves problems from a human perspective. We create meaningful changes in people to influence personal decisions and amplify community outcomes. Yes, we utilize some common channels — marketing, advertising and public relations, to name a few — but we never lose sight of what makes us human. And what matters to us as humans.
